citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:29 PM on
6/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the phone number on file and knocking on the
facility door. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:29 PM on 
6/12/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by calling the phone number on file and knocking on the 
facility door. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA 
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
